module.name: geometric_model_2d_3d_relationship
module.keywords: module, geometric model relationship, coordinated geometric models

abstract.li: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe a geometric relationship between a geometric model in a two dimensional coordinate system and a corresponding model in a three dimensional coordinate system where the relationship is for coordination purposes and not for definitional or placement purposes.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a coordinating relationship between a two dimensional geometric model and a three dimensional geometric model.

inscope.li: relationship of a geometric model in a two dimensional coordinate system to a geometric model in a three dimensional coordinate system through the application of a geometric transformation.

outscope.li: import of the representation of the shape of an occurrence of a component in a representation of the shape of the product that uses it.
